description: NeptunJS is an online video game console emulator that integrates with other emulation software, to provide a multiplatform emulator. The emulator has its own website at NeptunJS.xyz, and it is integrated into other websites, such as RetroGames.cz and MyEmulator.online.
When a player presses the Download save state button while playing a game in NeptunJS, the game produces a GGZ file. This file contains a record of the player's in-progress game.
